fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: European Public Prosecutor, Directives in the criminal field, TTIP-Agreement, Justice Scoreboard, BASEL III, European Patentcourts
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: EAJ is one of four Regional Groups of the International Association of Judges
goals__remit:
strenghen and support the rule of law and judicial independence 
safeguard constitutional and moral standing of judiciary 
study judicial problems of European, regional or national interest 
improve knowledge of European law and judicial co-operation 
defend and represent the interests of European judges and magistrates
position: Member of the EU-Committe of EAJ
